HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Česká pošta: 99 Kč, GLS: 99 Kč. Free shipping for orders over 2000 Kč.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Orders received by 12:00 on a business day are usually dispatched the same day. Orders received after 12:00 are dispatched the next business day. If goods are being transferred from branches, dispatch may take three business days.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Zásilkovna: 50 Kč, Balíkovna: 50 Kč. Free shipping for orders over 2000 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: Zásilkovna: 50 Kč, Balíkovna: 50 Kč. Free shipping for orders over 2000 Kč.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Armed.cz offers home delivery, parcel shop/locker delivery, and in-store pickup in the Czech Republic.
PROVIDERS: Home delivery is handled by Česká pošta and GLS. Parcel points are available through Zásilkovna and Balíkovna. In-store pickup is available at six locations.
PRICING: Home delivery costs 99 Kč. Parcel point delivery costs 50 Kč. In-store pickup is free. Shipping is free for all orders over 2000 Kč. The cash on delivery (COD) surcharge is 30 Kč.
DELIVERY TIME: Orders for in-stock items are typically dispatched the same or next business day.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Free shipping threshold at 2000 Kč. A network of six physical stores for free personal collection (Tábor, Praha 9, Vyškov, Plzeň, Brno, Pardubice). Simple and flat-rate pricing structure.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented clearly and concisely on a dedicated page. The pricing is transparent and easy to understand with a simple table. The page lacks information on specific delivery timeframes (e.g., D+1), express delivery options, weekend delivery, and any details regarding bulky item shipping.
